name: Look — a bird!
description:
It's a warm summer evening after a long day at work. 

You are about to get ready for bed, but suddenly a beautiful bird flies to your windowsill! 

You have not seen such birds in the city for years. You must take a picture of the bird before it flies away! 

But hurry up, you only have 10 seconds left!

It's the first game in my 2021:GameAMonth project. The theme for the first month was "TEN SECONDS OR LESS". 

Note: You can find all you photos in [PATH_TO_GAME]/Screenshots folder.
